4. CRITICAL ACCOUNTING JUDGMENTS AND KEY SOURCES OF ESTIMATION UNCERTAINTV

While applying the accounting poiioies as stated in Note 3 to the financial statements, management of the Group has made certain judgments, estimates and assumptions that are not readily apparent from other sources. The estimates and associated assumptions are based on historicai experience and other factors that are considered to be relevant. Actual results may differ from these estimates.
